Hero Builds

The Hero release is built atop the latest Flash Player and AIR runtimes. Because of this tight coupling, we are unable to provide full Hero nightly builds that showcase in-development Flash Player and AIR features. This includes new Hero mobile framework features and certain Hero desktop features. The builds posted below contains new Hero features that do not rely on these in-development runtimes. These builds are the equivalent to nightly development builds and as such, may contain a higher number of bugs and unfinished features.

Note: These builds do not contain any Hero Mobile features or runtimes.

Build Build Date Adobe Flex SDK Open Source Flex SDK Adobe Add-ons
4.5.0.19786 Thu Feb 3, 2011 Download (ZIP, 170MB) N/A N/A
4.5.0.18623 Tue Nov 30, 2010 Download (ZIP, 170MB) N/A N/A
4.5.0.17855 Fri Sep 24, 2010 Download (ZIP, 138MB) N/A N/A
4.5.0.17077 Wed Jul 28, 2010 Download (ZIP, 138MB) N/A N/A
